segments.text: Hello , Michael . My name's Shirley . Pleased to meet you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pleased to meet you , too , Shirley . So , what do you do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I work in marketing . I'm a regional marketing manager for an IT company . Normally , I work out of Beijing , but I'm here on business . My friend Judy over there , she lives here and she invited me to this party . And you ? How about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I live here . I was invited by George-he's the tall guy over there . He looks a bit drunk , actually ...
segments.speaker: S2
